name: Medallion
description:
At Medallion Fulfillment & Logistics, your Los Angeles fulfillment house, we do everything you need to process and ship your orders cost effectively whatever your business size.
Whether your fulfillment needs are for just the Los Angeles, California area; the greater California region; the west coast of the United States, all of the United States; and even Canada, we have the cost effective fulfillment solutions that take the headache out of inventory management, order processing, customer service, order shipping, and customer return management.
READ MORE...
